arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund XI vs FC Copenhagen – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund travel to the Parken Stadium on Tuesday night to face FC Copenhagen in what promises to be another captivating UEFA Champions League encounter. The Danish team are still searching for their maiden win in this season’s competition. At the same time, the visitors arrive determined to extend their unbeaten run in Europe and […] The post Borussia Dortmund XI vs FC Copenhagen – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: FC Copenhagen vs Borussia Dortmund: Champions League preview, team news & predicted lineups
arts.sum: Team news, predicted lineups and key insights ahead of FC Copenhagen vs. Borussia Dortmund in the Champions League.

arts.ttl: Copenhagen vs. Borussia Dortmund: UEFA Champions League LIVE blog and team news
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund have a chance to quickly put Saturday's Klassiker defeat behind them and continue their unbeaten start to the UEFA Champions League's league phase when they travel to Copenhagen on Tuesday (kick-off: 9.00pm CEST). Borussia have netted four goals in successive Champions League matches for the first time since the 2014/15 group stage, when they did so in back-to-back games against Galatasaray.

Kobenhavn are going through a somewhat turbulent period, winning only two of their last eight matches. They are far from the top of the Danish Superliga table and have only managed one point in their ...
